V. A generating set Aof V is called minimal if there exists no smaller setminimal
˜A⊆A⊆V that spans V. Every linearly independent generating set of V
is minimal and is called a basis of V.basis
Draft (2019-10-15) of “Mathematics for Machine Learning”. Feedback:https://mml-book.com.
